dimensions:
Certificate: 44.8 x 61.5 cm (17 5/8 x 24 3/16 in.)
Certificate with ribbons & seal fully extended: 72 x 61.5 cm (28 3/8 x 24 3/16 in.)
title: Certificate of Membership in the Book-binder's Guild
medium: Pen and red and black inks on parchment; silk ribbon with seal in wooden mount mechanically attached to certificate
description: Horizontal rectangle. Certificate of membership in the guild of bookbinders issued by Simon Ibersperger to his son, Johannes, on 16 January 1750 upon his admission to the bookbinders guild at Klosterneuberg.  The calligraphy is very elaborate with a checkered red and black penwork border.  It is signed by four guild members in boxes prepared before signing.  A wooden seal of the guild dated 1651 hangs from two crimson ribbons attached to the vellum.
name: Calligraphy
